entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
